title: What's that touchscreen in my room?
dot:
digraph ApartmentTech{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style=rounded, color=gray, fontname="Arial"];subgraph cluster_apartment{label="Apartment Setup";color=lightgrey;style=filled;Touchscreen[label="Touchscreen
(Unknown Device)"];EnergyManager[label="Energy Manager
(Communicates via WiFi)"];Network[label="WiFi Network
(SSID & Pwd)"];Touchscreen->EnergyManager[label="Communicates via
WiFi Network"];Network->Touchscreen;Network->EnergyManager;}subgraph cluster_discovery{label="Discovery Process";color=lightgrey;style=filled;Brochure[label="Brochure Found"];Reset[label="Device Reset
(Android Boot)"];EnergyUsage[label="Energy Usage
Monitoring"];Brochure->Touchscreen[label="Identified as
Energy Monitoring System"];Reset->Touchscreen[label="Revealed as

Data"];}subgraph cluster_issues{label="Technical Issues";color=lightgrey;style=filled;NoPower[label="No Power
(Fuse Missing)"];Connection[label="WiFi Connection
Issue"];NoPower->EnergyManager;Connection->Touchscreen;Connection->EnergyManager;}subgraph cluster_solution{label="Technical Solutions";color=lightgrey;style=filled;ReplaceFuse[label="Replace Fuse
(3A)"];IPDiscovery[label="IP & Port
Discovery"];ReplaceFuse->NoPower[label="Restored Power"];IPDiscovery->Connection[label="Access to
Energy Manager"];}subgraph cluster_hacking{label="Hacking Exploration";color=lightgrey;style=filled;SSHAccess[label="SSH Access
(Overcoming Security)"];TCFExploration[label="TCF-Agent
(FileSystem & Processes)"];SSHAccess->EnergyManager[label="Gained Access"];TCFExploration->EnergyManager[label="Explored System"];}subgraph cluster_application{label="Application Insights";color=lightgrey;style=filled;NodeApp[label="Node.js App
(Energy Data)"];PulseApp[label="Pulse App
(Data Collection)"];NodeApp->EnergyManager[label="Displays Data"];PulseApp->EnergyManager[label="Collects Data"];}Touchscreen->Brochure[style=dashed, color=blue];EnergyManager->Brochure[style=dashed, color=blue];EnergyManager->Network[style=dashed, color=blue];Brochure->Network[style=dashed, color=blue];Brochure->IPDiscovery[style=dashed, color=blue];Brochure->TCFExploration[style=dashed, color=blue];}

title: Ubisoft Says Out Loud: We Want People to Get Used to Not Owning What They Bought
dot:
digraph UbisoftOwnershipModel{rankdir=TB;node[shape=rectangle, style=filled, color=lightblue];title[label="Ubisoft's Digital Ownership Model", shape=plaintext, style=bold, fontsize=16, color=black];intro[label="Ubisoft wants consumers to get used to not owning digital purchases"]; physical_to_digital[label="Transition: Physical Products to Digital Purchases"];misalignment[label="Consumer Misalignment: Perception vs Reality"];subscription_service[label="Ubisoft+ Subscription Model"];consumer_shift[label="Desired Consumer Shift: From Ownership to Access"]; pros[label="Advantages of Subscription Model"];cons[label="Challenges in Adoption"]; pros_detail[label="Access to a broad range of titles without owning
Convenience and flexibility"];cons_detail[label="Higher cost for limited library
Consumer resistance to non-ownership
Potential for digital content loss"]; title->intro;intro->physical_to_digital;intro->misalignment;intro->subscription_service;subscription_service->consumer_shift; consumer_shift->pros;consumer_shift->cons; pros->pros_detail;cons->cons_detail; comments[label="Public Reaction: Backlash and Debate", shape=plaintext, color=white, fontsize=12];comments->consumer_shift[style=dashed];}
